tasks: Under Terv Pro, conducted Java training sessions for college students to support their placements, providing hands-on guidance and support.
Conducted a few technical sessions for students under the TN Naan Mudhalvan scheme during college.
Outcomes included gained valuable knowledge and built friendly coordination with both students and teammates, while receiving a monthly stipend during the internship period.
Under SmartCliff Learning Solutions, received full stack web development training on MERN through technical trainers.
Developed concept-based projects, completed assigned tasks within the given timeframe, and demonstrated the outcomes during the training period.
Overall, learned and completed real-time projects on full stack development, and interactions with trainers and teammates helped gain valuable development knowledge.
Completed weekly assigned projects and their reports within the allocated time period.
Enhanced self-paced learning by acquiring new skills in web development while completing the assigned basic projects.
Outcomes included improved creativity skills and the ability to solve bugs independently in the projects.
Received a freelancing offer through LinkedIn, completed project tasks via ClickUp within the allocated timeframe, and showcased the results through Teams.
Developed client-side scripts and custom web parts to retrieve data using JavaScript and jQuery in MS SharePoint.
Overall, learned and improved workflows in SharePoint and received a weekly stipend upon task completion.
Initially gained an in-depth understanding of hospital software workflow structures by working hands-on with MediSteer and Curengine platforms.

Led the end-to-end implementation of hospital management software across multiple healthcare facilities, including requirement analysis, environment setup, data migration, and deployment, ensuring projects were completed on time and met quality standards.

Provided prompt and effective technical support to end-users, troubleshooting software issues, guiding staff through problem resolution, and ensuring high customer satisfaction and minimal disruption to hospital operations.

Designed and developed responsive JSP-based user interfaces integrated with Java Servlets, enabling dynamic data handling and interaction with PostgreSQL databases for secure storage and retrieval of patient and hospital records.

Utilized iReport tools to design and generate comprehensive JasperReports, creating detailed and insightful reports for hospital management to improve data-driven decision-making and operational efficiency.

Conducted application demonstrations, workshops, and training sessions for hospital staff and potential clients, clearly explaining software functionality, workflows, and best practices to improve user adoption and confidence.

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to identify, report, and resolve software bugs, implement enhancements, and ensure smooth deployment and maintenance of hospital management software, optimizing workflow efficiency and system reliability.
